body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, as per https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44923#issuecomment-2267853936

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported for 2024 data-taking operations.
title: instrument `fitVertices` to output more information when failing assert (issue cms-sw/cmssw#44923)
